name: TBH
description:
TBH is a board game designed to be played in social settings to foster open communication and either facilitate or strengthen connections. Play with friends, family, significant others, or complete strangers. The game aims to achieve a greater and more profound relationship between people in a fun and competitive way.

What you need to play:

  • The board Three card decks 
  • Pawns
  • 1 six-sided die
  • A timer
  • A willingness to open up 

INSTRUCTIONS:

  •  Set up the board by placing the deck of cards on their designated spot
  • Place your pawns at the start space
  • The youngest player goes first
  • Roll the die and move your pawn that many spaces
  • The space you land on will have an icon, choose a card from the corresponding deck
    • The deck with a question mark on it will have situational questions
    • The deck with a brain on it will ask questions designed to get to know each other on a deeper level
    • The deck with a heart on it will ask questions designed to create or strengthen personal connections
  • Be honest and open when answering these questions
  • The player who reaches the X at the end wins the game
